description: Russia begins a "non-working week" to try to slow the spread of coronavirus.
title: Coronavirus: Russia sees no epidemic but starts shutdown
title_page: Coronavirus: Russia sees no epidemic but starts shutdown - BBC News
maintext: "There's deaths from cancer and other diseases all the time and people still go to work, take the metro or go to the park," Dmitry shrugged, the day before the bicycle-hire shop he works at was closed.
